name: Raccoon Elektrick: Game Over
description:
A virtual electronic game for the tenth anniversary of a story I wrote. First released in 2015.

Help SC the fox show his love to Elizabeth the rabbit by bringing hearts to her, but watch out for attack by villains trying to cause the couple some heartbreak! Comes with two different game modes.

Play on your computer with the Windows downloads (one of which was made with the YoYo Compiler, if that makes a difference), or take it on the go with the Android app download for an authentic handheld experience.
